p: There were 312 PBHs surveyed from 66 households “ Table 3” and 31 households did not have any visible breeding sites. Aedes larvae were found in only 4% (12/312) breeding habitats among 12 different households “ Fig 5”. All the Aedes hatched were Ae. aegypti and no other potential arbovirus vectors such as Ae. africanus and Ae. albopictus were found.
